MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA11 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Rosthwaite Grove, Dalston Drive, Broad Lane  and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:16PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site repairing an underground cable fault and we have further specialist engineers on their way to repair the generator. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:27PM on 13th November 2020
